Texts.Chs: 现在你有了一张改进的强力工具的升级蓝图。当你准备好的时候我会告诉你的。^white;
Texts.Eng: Now that you have the blueprint for a powerful tool, you may be able to upgrade it. I will let you know when that time comes.^white;

Texts.Chs: 你现在更加机警了！我已经升级了你的小钻风。你现在也可以在升级的铁砧上制造饥渴小钻风了。
Texts.Eng: You're a lot more vigilant now! I have upgraded your Spira. You will now also be able to build Hungry Spira in an upgraded anvil.
